Client Engagement, Simplified. Gathering online reviews doesn't have to be complicated. Included with your Justia Amplify service, our NEW Justia Review Platform makes it easy for you to build confidence with your clients through a personalized all-in-one review page!

Your Justia Review Platform Page:
https://j.st/122506

The Justia Review Platform showcases your photo in addition to your practice areas, jurisdictions, years of experience, and a link to your website. Through your branded page, clients can leave you reviews on platforms such as:
Lawyer Directory
Google My Business
Local Services Ads

What's the Big Deal About Online Reviews?Now more than ever, strengthening your online reputation is vital for generating business. Within the last decade, online reviews have rapidly revolutionized the purchasing decisions of consumers. Did you know that the average consumer reads 10 online reviews before they feel comfortable trusting a business?¹ That's a whole lot of reviews!

The impact of receiving written feedback from clients goes far beyond business validation. Online reviews create opportunities to directly spark meaningful conversations and develop lasting relationships with your clients.

Save It. Send It.We encourage you to save the URL of your review platform page so that you can forward it to your clients. There are plenty of ways that you can initiate asking for reviews, such as requesting them from clients over a phone call, through email, or via text message. More review options will be added to the Justia Review Platform in the future, so stay tuned. Get started on sending out your review platform page today!

Justia PPC Management is now called Justia Amplify. The Justia Review Platform is exclusively for active Justia Amplify clients.

¹ https://www.brightlocal.com/research/local-consumer-review-survey/
